maxFactor.title: Max Sale Price (%)
maxFactor.description: Percentage to calculate the seller's max offer sale price (only numbers, without decimals). - 100 => 100%

minFactor.title: Min Sale Price (%)
minFactor.description: Percentage to calculate the seller's min offer sale price (only numbers, without decimals). - 100 => 100%

concatBrandInName.title: Concatenate brand to name
concatBrandInName.description: When this flag is enabled, the brand will concatenate with product name (into eMAG product name must contain brand name)

valueConcatProductName.title: Value to concatenate with product name
valueConcatProductName.description: This value will be concatenated with product name into eMAG

handlingTime.title: Handling time
handlingTime.description: Handling time, in number of days counted from the day the order was received. If handling_time = 0 the order will be shipped the same day it is received.

valueConcatProductId.title: Value to concatenate with SKU ID
valueConcatProductId.description: This value will be concatenated with SKU ID into eMAG

oversizedShipping.title: Oversized shipping
oversizedShipping.description: If enabled, marks the delivery as containing oversized products

saturdayDelivery.title: Saturday delivery
saturdayDelivery.description: If enabled, sender requests the package to be delivered on Saturday

samedayDelivery.title: Sameday delivery
samedayDelivery.description: If enabled, sender requests the package to be delivered the same day
